sentences.en: Beethoven's Ninth Symphony is a glorious piece of music.
sentences.cn: 贝多芬的第九交响曲是壮丽的音乐篇章.

sentences.en: By the ninth hour the car was running in eighth position.
sentences.cn: 到第9个小时的时候，这辆车位列第8。

sentences.en: Coaches were numerous , pedestrians many , and in Fifty - ninth Street the street cars were crowded.
sentences.cn: 到处都是马车和行人, 五十九 街的有轨电车十分拥挤.

sentences.en: He is ninth.
sentences.cn: 他是第九名。

sentences.en: I was in the Ninth Machine - gun Battalion. "
sentences.cn: 我在第九机枪连. ”

sentences.en: In Brussels the dollar rose by a ninth of a cent.
sentences.cn: 在布鲁塞尔美元升值了1/9美分。

sentences.en: In that region, Chile went from ninth to first, overall, as Chilean mobile web use increased by 3200% over the past year.
sentences.cn: 智利从这一地区的第九跃升到第一位，因为智利的移动网络用户在过去一年增长了 3200% 。

sentences.en: In the 1904 marathon, an athlete time when he was chased of course by two dogs. He came back again and managed to finish ninth only.
sentences.cn: 1904年的马拉松比赛，计时开始，一名运动员却正被两只狗追赶，他再次回到比赛中，也只是努力完成了九分之一的赛程。

sentences.en: It was almost five years ago, May the ninth.
sentences.cn: 那是将近五年以前, 5月9日.

sentences.en: Now, this ninth - grade diploma isn't going to help me much in life.
sentences.cn: 眼下, 这个九年级的毕业文凭在我的生活中不会有多大帮助的.

sentences.en: On the ninth day of Christmas.
sentences.cn: 在圣诞节的第九天。

sentences.en: September is the ninth month of the year.
sentences.cn: 九月是一年中的第九个月.

sentences.en: She had an apartment on the ninth floor.
sentences.cn: 她在九层楼上有一套房子.

sentences.en: The car sped up to Ninth Avenue and turned downtown.
sentences.cn: 汽车向第九路飞驰,然后又转向闹市区.

sentences.en: The century has rounded into its ninth decade.
sentences.cn: 本世纪已进入了90年代.

sentences.en: The dollar rose by a ninth of a cent.
sentences.cn: 美元升值了1/9美分

sentences.en: The Lithuanian Philharmonic Orchestra played Beethoven's Ninth Symphony.
sentences.cn: 立陶宛爱乐交响乐团演奏了贝多芬的《第九交响曲》。

sentences.en: The Ninth Symphony of Beethoven is a famous one.
sentences.cn: 贝多芬的第九交响乐非常有名.

sentences.en: the rousing finale of Beethoven's Ninth Symphony
sentences.cn: 贝多芬第九交响曲激动人心的末乐章

sentences.en: Then, in eighth or ninth grade, I studied astronomy, cosmology, and the origins of the universe.
sentences.cn: 后来，在八、九年级的时候，我在学习天文学，宇宙学和宇宙的起源。

sentences.en: What did the suspect do on July ninth?
sentences.cn: 嫌疑犯在七月九日做了什么事情?

words.tran_cn: 第九十的；九十分之一的

trans.tran_en: coming after eight other things in a series
